mapper.select: select p_num, l_code, m_code, s_code, p_name, p_ename, p_price, p_desc, p_info new_best, p_img from menu
mapper.insert: insert into menu(p_num, l_code, m_code, s_code, p_name, p_ename, p_price, p_desc, p_info, new_best, p_img) values(menusq.nextval, #{l_code}, #{m_code}, #{s_code}, #{p_name}, #{p_ename}, #{p_price}, #{p_desc}, #{p_info}, #{new_best}, #{p_img})
